mapper.select: select comment.*, user.username, topic.title from comment, user, topic where comment.comment_user_id = user.id and comment.comment_topic_id = topic.id;

select max(child_floor) from comment where comment_topic_id = #{commentTopicId} and floor = #{parentFloor};
mapper.insert: insert into comment (content, comment_user_id, comment_topic_id, comment_time, floor, reply, child_floor) values (#{content}, #{commentUserId}, #{commentTopicId}, #{commentTime}, #{floor}, #{reply}, #{childFloor})
mapper.update: update comment set support_count = support_count + #{count} where id = #{commentId};
